This does NOT atomically clean up reward state - used to test if

instructions.name: burn_nft_with_subscription
docs: Burn a content NFT with full subscription pool reconciliation
- Auto-claims pending rewards from all pools
- Removes weight from ContentRewardPool, CreatorPatronPool, GlobalHolderPool, CreatorDistPool
- Reduces CreatorWeight.total_weight but keeps debt (creator penalty)
- Closes UnifiedNftRewardState and burns NFT

accounts.name: unified_nft_state
docs: UnifiedNftRewardState - will be closed and rent refunded to owner

docs: Creator of the content

docs: CreatorPatronPool - remove weight

instructions.name: claim_rewards_verified
docs: Claim rewards with on-chain NFT verification using per-NFT reward tracking
This is the recommended claim method - it verifies actual NFT ownership at claim time
and uses per-NFT reward_debt for fair distribution regardless of transfers
Pass pairs of (nft_asset, nft_reward_state) as remaining_accounts:
[nft_asset_1, nft_reward_state_1, nft_asset_2, nft_reward_state_2, ...]
The instruction will:
1. Auto-sync any secondary sale royalties that arrived via Metaplex Royalties plugin
2. Verify each NFT belongs to the content's collection
3. Verify each NFT is owned by the claimer
4. Calculate rewards for each NFT: (reward_per_share - nft.reward_debt) / PRECISION
5. Update each NFT's reward_debt
6. Transfer total rewards to claimer

Creator must set fees for all three tiers

docs: Subscribe to a creator (Streamflow payment)
Creates subscription record - payment handled via Streamflow stream
stream_id: The Streamflow stream ID for this subscription's payment

accounts.name: patron_config
docs: Creator's patron configuration

accounts.name: patron_subscription
docs: User's subscription to this creator (to be created)

accounts.name: creator
docs: The creator being subscribed to

accounts.name: subscriber
docs: The subscriber paying for the subscription

instructions.name: sync_nft_transfer
docs: Handle NFT transfer - called by Metaplex Core lifecycle hook
This is NOT called via CPI from Metaplex - it's a separate instruction
that must be called after the transfer to sync reward state.
For now, we implement a manual sync approach where users call this
after transferring NFTs to update their reward positions.

accounts.name: content_reward_pool
docs: The content's reward pool

accounts.name: sender_wallet_state
docs: The sender's wallet state for this content

accounts.name: receiver_wallet_state
docs: The receiver's wallet state for this content (created if needed)

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender (must sign to authorize the sync)

instructions.name: sync_nft_transfers_batch
docs: Batch sync multiple NFT transfers at once
Useful when transferring multiple NFTs from same content

accounts.name: content_reward_pool
docs: The content's reward pool

accounts.name: sender_wallet_state
docs: The sender's wallet state for this content

accounts.name: receiver_wallet_state
docs: The receiver's wallet state for this content (created if needed)

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender (must sign to authorize the sync)

instructions.name: tip_content
docs: Tip a creator for their content

instructions.name: topup_ecosystem_membership
docs: Extend ecosystem membership by topping up existing stream
duration_type: 0 = monthly, 1 = yearly

instructions.name: unregister_moderator
docs: Unregister as a moderator and withdraw stake

instructions.name: unwrap_creator_patron_treasury_wsol
docs: Unwrap WSOL from creator patron streaming treasury to native SOL
Anyone can call this - it converts accumulated WSOL from Streamflow to SOL

accounts.name: creator
docs: The creator whose patron treasury to unwrap

accounts.name: creator_patron_treasury
docs: The creator's patron streaming treasury PDA

accounts.name: treasury_wsol_ata
docs: The treasury's WSOL token account

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call this to trigger unwrap

instructions.name: unwrap_ecosystem_treasury_wsol
docs: Unwrap WSOL from ecosystem streaming treasury to native SOL
Anyone can call this - it converts accumulated WSOL from Streamflow to SOL
Must be called before epoch distribution can work with the accumulated funds

accounts.name: ecosystem_streaming_treasury
docs: The ecosystem streaming treasury PDA

accounts.name: treasury_wsol_ata
docs: The treasury's WSOL token account

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call this to trigger unwrap

instructions.name: update_bundle
docs: Update bundle active status
Metadata is stored in IPFS/Metaplex, not on-chain

instructions.name: update_bundle_mint_settings
docs: Update bundle mint settings (creator only)

instructions.name: update_bundle_rent_config
docs: Update bundle rent settings (creator only)

instructions.name: update_content
docs: Update content settings (creator only, not locked)
Metadata is stored in IPFS/Metaplex, not on-chain

instructions.name: update_ecosystem
docs: Update ecosystem settings (admin only)

instructions.name: update_ecosystem_sub_config
docs: Update ecosystem subscription settings (admin only)

instructions.name: update_epoch_duration
docs: Update epoch duration (admin only, for E2E testing)

accounts.name: ecosystem_epoch_state
docs: EcosystemEpochState - shared epoch tracking

accounts.name: ecosystem_config
docs: Ecosystem config must exist and admin must match

instructions.name: update_mint_settings
docs: Update mint settings (creator only, with restrictions after first mint)

instructions.name: update_patron_config
docs: Update patron configuration (creator only)

accounts.name: patron_config
docs: Creator's patron configuration

accounts.name: creator
docs: The creator who owns the config

instructions.name: update_rent_config
docs: Update rental settings (creator only)
Allows updating individual tier fees or all at once

instructions.name: update_user_profile
docs: Update user profile username

instructions.name: voluntary_removal
docs: Allow creator to voluntarily remove reported content

instructions.name: vote_on_report
docs: Vote on a content moderation report (moderators only)

instructions.name: withdraw_creator_stream_to_treasury
docs: Withdraw accumulated WSOL from Streamflow stream to creator patron treasury
Anyone can call this to enable permissionless distribution

accounts.name: creator
docs: The creator whose patron treasury receives the funds

accounts.name: creator_patron_treasury
docs: The creator's patron streaming treasury PDA (stream recipient)

accounts.name: treasury_wsol_ata
docs: The treasury's WSOL token account

accounts.name: stream_metadata
docs: The Streamflow stream metadata account

accounts.name: escrow_tokens
docs: The escrow token account holding streamed funds

accounts.name: streamflow_treasury
docs: Streamflow treasury for their fee

accounts.name: streamflow_treasury_wsol
docs: Streamflow treasury WSOL account

accounts.name: partner
docs: Partner account

accounts.name: partner_wsol
docs: Partner WSOL account

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: WSOL mint

accounts.name: streamflow_program
docs: Streamflow program

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call this

instructions.name: withdraw_ecosystem_stream_to_treasury
docs: Withdraw accumulated WSOL from Streamflow stream to ecosystem treasury
Step 1: Pull released funds from Streamflow escrow to treasury's WSOL ATA
Step 2: Call unwrap_ecosystem_treasury_wsol to convert WSOL to native SOL
Anyone can call this to enable permissionless distribution

accounts.name: ecosystem_streaming_treasury
docs: The ecosystem streaming treasury PDA (stream recipient)

accounts.name: treasury_wsol_ata
docs: The treasury's WSOL token account (receives withdrawn funds)

accounts.name: stream_metadata
docs: The Streamflow stream metadata account

accounts.name: escrow_tokens
docs: The escrow token account holding streamed funds

accounts.name: streamflow_treasury
docs: Streamflow treasury for their fee

accounts.name: streamflow_treasury_wsol
docs: Streamflow treasury WSOL account

accounts.name: partner
docs: Partner account (same as what was used in create)

accounts.name: partner_wsol
docs: Partner WSOL account

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: WSOL mint

accounts.name: streamflow_program
docs: Streamflow program

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can call this to trigger withdrawal

errors.name: CidTooLong
errors.msg: CID must be 64 characters or less

errors.name: InvalidTipAmount
errors.msg: Tip amount must be greater than 0

errors.name: CidAlreadyRegistered
errors.msg: Content CID already registered by another user

errors.name: CidHashMismatch
errors.msg: CID hash does not match the provided CID

errors.name: ContentLocked
errors.msg: Content is locked after first NFT mint

errors.name: MintConfigExists
errors.msg: Mint configuration already exists for this content

errors.name: MintingNotActive
errors.msg: Minting is not active for this content

errors.name: MaxSupplyTooHigh
errors.msg: Max supply cannot exceed 999,999 (6-digit edition limit)

errors.name: FreeMintNotAllowed
errors.msg: Free minting is not allowed - price must be greater than 0

errors.name: InvalidRoyalty
errors.msg: Royalty must be fixed at 4% (400 bps)

errors.name: CannotIncreaseSupply
errors.msg: Cannot increase supply after minting has started

errors.name: SupplyBelowMinted
errors.msg: Cannot set supply below already minted count

errors.name: NftMismatch
errors.msg: NFT asset does not match the reward state

errors.name: ContentMismatch
errors.msg: Content does not match the reward pool

errors.name: NotNftOwner
errors.msg: Holder does not own this NFT

errors.name: InvalidAccountPairs
errors.msg: Invalid account pairs for batch claim

errors.name: InvalidHookCaller
errors.msg: Invalid lifecycle hook caller - must be Metaplex Core

errors.name: SenderNotOwner
errors.msg: Sender does not own this NFT

errors.name: InvalidNftAsset
errors.msg: Invalid NFT asset - not a valid Metaplex Core asset

errors.name: NftNotInCollection
errors.msg: NFT does not belong to the content's collection

errors.name: ClaimerNotOwner
errors.msg: Claimer does not own this NFT

errors.name: RentingNotActive
errors.msg: Renting is not active for this content

errors.name: InvalidRentPeriod
errors.msg: Rent period must be between 1 hour and 365 days

errors.name: RentConfigExists
errors.msg: Rent config already exists for this content

errors.name: RentalNotFound
errors.msg: Rental not found - NFT does not have rental attributes

errors.name: BundleNotEmpty
errors.msg: Bundle must be empty to delete

errors.name: NotContentCreator
errors.msg: Only the content creator can add to bundles

errors.name: BundleLocked
errors.msg: Bundle is locked after first NFT mint

errors.name: CancelTooEarly
errors.msg: Cannot cancel pending mint yet - must wait at least 10 minutes

errors.name: AlreadyFulfilled
errors.msg: Randomness already fulfilled for this request

errors.name: RandomnessNotAvailable
errors.msg: Randomness not yet available - wait for oracle callback

errors.name: FallbackTooEarly
errors.msg: Fallback claim too early - must wait for timeout

errors.name: NotCreator
errors.msg: Only the content creator can perform this action

errors.name: NotAdmin
errors.msg: Only the ecosystem admin can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidState
errors.msg: Invalid state - account should not exist or has wrong data

errors.name: InvalidNftType
errors.msg: Invalid NFT type - expected content NFT but got bundle NFT or vice versa

errors.name: InvalidPatronConfig
errors.msg: Invalid patron config - at least one tier must be enabled

errors.name: NftOrRentalRequired
errors.msg: NFT ownership or active rental required for this content (subscriptions not accepted)

errors.name: InvalidDurationType
errors.msg: Invalid duration type - must be 0 (monthly) or 1 (yearly)

errors.name: InvalidStreamId
errors.msg: Invalid stream ID - does not match subscription record

errors.name: InvalidContentName
errors.msg: Invalid content name - must be 1-32 characters

errors.name: AlreadyVoted
errors.msg: Moderator has already voted on this report

errors.name: VotingNotEnded
errors.msg: Voting period has not ended yet

errors.name: InvalidTimestamp
errors.msg: Timestamp too far from current time

errors.name: ModerationAdminOnly
errors.msg: Only admin can perform this action

types.name: Bundle
docs: Bundle account - stores bundle state for on-chain logic
Bundle metadata (CID, name, description) stored in Metaplex Core collection metadata
PDA seeds: ["bundle", bundle_id_hash]

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator of the bundle

fields.name: bundle_id
docs: Unique bundle identifier (e.g., slug or CID-based)

fields.name: collection_asset
docs: Metaplex Core collection asset for this bundle's NFTs

fields.name: bundle_type
docs: Type of bundle (determines semantics)

fields.name: item_count
docs: Number of items in the bundle

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether the bundle is active (visible/purchasable)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp of creation

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp of last update

fields.name: minted_count
docs: Number of NFTs successfully minted for this bundle

fields.name: pending_count
docs: Number of pending VRF mints (for max_supply checking)

fields.name: is_locked
docs: Whether bundle is locked (becomes true after first mint)

fields.name: visibility_level
docs: Visibility level for access control (4-tier model, default: 1)
Level 0: Public - anyone can access (free content, samples, previews)
Level 1: Ecosystem - ecosystem sub OR creator sub OR NFT/Rental
Level 2: Subscriber - creator sub OR NFT/Rental (ecosystem sub NOT enough)
Level 3: NFT Only - ONLY NFT owners or renters (subscriptions don't grant access)

types.name: BundleItem
docs: BundleItem account - links content to a bundle with ordering

fields.name: bundle
docs: Reference to the Bundle account

fields.name: content
docs: Reference to the ContentEntry account

fields.name: position
docs: Position within the bundle (0-indexed)
Used for ordered bundles like albums, courses

fields.name: added_at
docs: Timestamp when item was added

types.name: BundleMintConfig
docs: Bundle mint configuration (mirrors MintConfig for content)
PDA seeds: ["bundle_mint_config", bundle_pda]

fields.name: bundle
docs: The bundle this config belongs to

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator who owns this config

fields.name: price
docs: Price per NFT in lamports (minimum 0.001 SOL, free mint not allowed)

fields.name: max_supply
docs: Maximum supply (None = unlimited)

fields.name: creator_royalty_bps
docs: Creator royalty on secondary sales (basis points, e.g., 500 = 5%)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether minting is currently enabled

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when config was created

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp when config was last updated

types.name: BundleRentConfig
docs: Bundle rent configuration (mirrors RentConfig for content)
PDA seeds: ["bundle_rent_config", bundle_pda]

fields.name: bundle
docs: The bundle this rent config belongs to

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator who can update rent settings

fields.name: rent_fee_6h
docs: Rent fee for 6-hour access (lamports)

fields.name: rent_fee_1d
docs: Rent fee for 1-day access (lamports)

fields.name: rent_fee_7d
docs: Rent fee for 7-day access (lamports)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether renting is currently enabled

fields.name: total_rentals
docs: Total number of times this bundle has been rented

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Total fees collected from rentals (lamports)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when config was created

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp when config was last updated

types.name: BundleRewardPool
docs: Bundle reward pool (mirrors ContentRewardPool)
Per-bundle reward pool with rarity-weighted distribution
Secondary sale holder rewards split 50/50 between bundle holders and content holders
PDA seeds: ["bundle_reward_pool", bundle_pda]

fields.name: bundle
docs: The bundle this pool belongs to

fields.name: reward_per_share
docs: Accumulated reward per weight unit (scaled by PRECISION)

fields.name: total_nfts
docs: Total NFTs minted for this bundle

fields.name: total_weight
docs: Total weight of all NFTs (sum of individual rarity weights)

fields.name: total_deposited
docs: Total rewards ever deposited to this pool (lamports)

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total rewards claimed from this pool (lamports)

fields.name: pending_content_share
docs: Pending content share from secondary sales (50% of holder rewards)
Accumulated here until distributed to content pools via separate instruction

fields.name: total_content_distributed
docs: Total content share distributed to content pools

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when pool was created

types.name: BundleType
docs: Bundle types - defines the semantics of the collection

types.name: ContentEntry
docs: Optimized ContentEntry - stores only data needed for on-chain logic
Content metadata (CID, type) is stored in Metaplex Core collection/NFT metadata
PDA seeds: ["content", cid_hash] - uniqueness enforced by PDA derivation

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator/owner of the content

fields.name: collection_asset
docs: Metaplex Core collection asset for this content's NFTs

fields.name: tips_received
docs: Tips received (lamports)

fields.name: is_locked
docs: Locked after first mint (no delete/edit metadata)

fields.name: minted_count
docs: Number of NFTs successfully minted (used for edition numbering)

fields.name: pending_count
docs: Number of pending VRF mints (for max_supply checking)

fields.name: is_encrypted
docs: Whether content is encrypted (requires NFT to access)

fields.name: preview_cid
docs: Preview CID for non-owners (empty if not gated)

fields.name: encryption_meta_cid
docs: Encryption metadata CID (empty if not encrypted)

fields.name: visibility_level
docs: Visibility level for access control (4-tier model, default: 1)
Level 0: Public - anyone can access (free content, samples, previews)
Level 1: Ecosystem - ecosystem sub OR creator sub OR NFT/Rental
Level 2: Subscriber - creator sub OR NFT/Rental (ecosystem sub NOT enough)
Level 3: NFT Only - ONLY NFT owners or renters (subscriptions don't grant access)

types.name: ContentRentedEvent
docs: Emitted when content is rented

fields.name: content
docs: Content being rented

fields.name: renter
docs: Renter's wallet

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator receiving payment

fields.name: nft_asset
docs: The rental NFT asset

fields.name: fee_paid
docs: Rent fee paid (lamports)

fields.name: rented_at
docs: Rental start timestamp

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Rental expiry timestamp

types.name: ContentReport
docs: Content report submitted by users
PDA seeds: ["content_report", content, reporter, timestamp]

fields.name: content
docs: Content being reported

fields.name: reporter
docs: User who submitted the report

fields.name: category
docs: Category of the report

fields.name: details_cid
docs: IPFS CID containing detailed report information

fields.name: status
docs: Current status of the report

fields.name: submitted_at
docs: Timestamp when report was submitted

fields.name: voting_ends_at
docs: Timestamp when voting ends

fields.name: votes_remove
docs: Number of votes to remove

fields.name: votes_keep
docs: Number of votes to keep

fields.name: votes_abstain
docs: Number of abstentions

fields.name: total_votes
docs: Total number of votes cast

fields.name: outcome
docs: Resolution outcome (if resolved)

fields.name: resolved_at
docs: Timestamp when resolved

fields.name: resolver
docs: Moderator who resolved the report

fields.name: reporter_refunded
docs: Whether reporter was refunded (if report upheld)

types.name: ContentRewardPool
docs: Per-content reward pool with rarity-weighted distribution
Each content piece has its own pool tracking holder rewards from that content's sales
Rewards are distributed proportionally based on NFT weight (rarity)
PDA seeds: ["content_reward_pool", content_pda]

fields.name: content
docs: The content this pool belongs to

fields.name: reward_per_share
docs: Accumulated reward per weight unit (scaled by PRECISION)
Increases with each sale: reward_per_share += (holder_reward * PRECISION) / total_weight

fields.name: total_nfts
docs: Total NFTs minted for this content

fields.name: total_weight
docs: Total weight of all NFTs (sum of individual rarity weights)
Used for weighted reward distribution

fields.name: total_deposited
docs: Total rewards ever deposited to this pool (lamports)

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total rewards claimed from this pool (lamports)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when pool was created

types.name: CreatorDistPool
docs: Global pool for ecosystem subscription creator payouts
Receives 80% of ecosystem subscription fees on epoch distribution
Creators claim based on their weight share (sum of their NFT weights)
PDA seeds: ["creator_dist_pool"]

fields.name: reward_per_share
docs: Accumulated reward per weight unit (scaled by PRECISION)

fields.name: total_weight
docs: Total weight of ALL NFTs globally (same as GlobalHolderPool)

fields.name: total_deposited
docs: Total SOL deposited into this pool

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total SOL claimed from this pool

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when pool was created

types.name: CreatorPatronConfig
docs: Creator's subscription/membership tier configuration
PDA seeds: ["creator_patron_config", creator]

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator who owns this config

fields.name: membership_price
docs: SOL per month for support-only tier (0 = disabled)

fields.name: subscription_price
docs: SOL per month for support + Level 2 access tier (0 = disabled)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether patron system is active for this creator

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when config was created

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp when config was last updated

types.name: CreatorPatronPool
docs: Per-creator pool for patron subscription holder rewards
Receives 12% of patron subscription fees on epoch distribution
PDA seeds: ["creator_patron_pool", creator]

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator this pool belongs to

fields.name: reward_per_share
docs: Accumulated reward per weight unit (scaled by PRECISION)

fields.name: total_weight
docs: Total weight of all NFTs for this creator (sum of rarity weights)

fields.name: total_deposited
docs: Total SOL deposited into this pool

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total SOL claimed from this pool

fields.name: last_distribution_at
docs: Timestamp of last epoch distribution

fields.name: epoch_duration
docs: Epoch duration in seconds (default: 30 days)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when pool was created

types.name: CreatorPatronSubscription
docs: Tracks a user's subscription to a specific creator
PDA seeds: ["creator_patron_sub", subscriber, creator]

fields.name: subscriber
docs: The subscriber's wallet

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator being subscribed to

fields.name: tier
docs: Membership or Subscription tier

fields.name: stream_id
docs: Streamflow stream account for ongoing payments

fields.name: started_at
docs: Timestamp when subscription started

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether subscription is currently active

types.name: CreatorWeight
docs: Tracks total weight of creator's NFTs for CreatorDistPool claims
PDA seeds: ["creator_weight", creator]

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator this weight belongs to

fields.name: total_weight
docs: Sum of weights of all NFTs created by this creator

fields.name: reward_debt
docs: Accumulated debt for CreatorDistPool (uses ADD not SET)

fields.name: total_claimed
docs: Total SOL claimed from CreatorDistPool

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when account was created

types.name: EcosystemConfig

fields.name: usdc_mint

fields.name: total_fees_usdc

fields.name: total_nfts_minted

fields.name: is_paused

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when config was created

fields.name: total_deposited

docs: Payment currency options

types.name: Rarity
docs: Rarity tiers with their probabilities and weights
Probability is in basis points (out of 10000)

types.name: RentConfig
docs: Rent configuration for a content piece
Uses 3-tier pricing: 6 hours, 1 day, 7 days
PDA seeds: ["rent_config", content_pda]

fields.name: content
docs: The content this rent config belongs to

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator who can update rent settings

fields.name: rent_fee_6h
docs: Rent fee for 6-hour access (lamports)

fields.name: rent_fee_1d
docs: Rent fee for 1-day access (lamports)

fields.name: rent_fee_7d
docs: Rent fee for 7-day access (lamports)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether renting is currently enabled

fields.name: total_rentals
docs: Total number of times this content has been rented

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Total fees collected from rentals (lamports)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when config was created

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp when config was last updated

types.name: RentTier
docs: Rental tier selection (0 = 6h, 1 = 1d, 2 = 7d)

types.name: ReportCategory
docs: Report category types

types.name: ReportStatus
docs: Current status of a report

types.name: ResolutionOutcome
docs: Outcome of moderation resolution

types.name: RewardClaimEvent
docs: Emitted when a user claims rewards from a pool

fields.name: pool_type
docs: Pool type: "content", "bundle", "patron", "global_holder", "creator_dist"

fields.name: pool_id
docs: Pool identifier (content/bundle/creator pubkey, or empty for global)

fields.name: claimer
docs: Claimer wallet

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount claimed (lamports)

fields.name: nft_asset
docs: NFT asset (if holder claim)

fields.name: nft_weight
docs: NFT weight (if holder claim)

fields.name: creator_weight
docs: Creator weight (if creator ecosystem payout)

fields.name: debt_before
docs: Reward debt before claim

fields.name: debt_after
docs: Reward debt after claim

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp

types.name: RewardDepositEvent
docs: Emitted when rewards are deposited to a pool (primary sales, subscriptions)

fields.name: pool_type
docs: Type of pool: "content", "bundle", "creator_patron", "global_holder", "creator_dist"

fields.name: pool_id
docs: Pool identifier (content/bundle/creator pubkey, or empty string for global pools)

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount deposited to pool (lamports)

fields.name: source_type
docs: Source transaction type: "mint", "patron_subscription", "ecosystem_subscription", "secondary_royalty"

fields.name: source
docs: Source identifier (buyer/subscriber wallet, or secondary sale asset)

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator involved (if applicable)

fields.name: content_or_bundle
docs: Content or bundle involved (if applicable)

fields.name: new_reward_per_share
docs: New reward_per_share after deposit

fields.name: fee_split
docs: Fee split breakdown (if applicable - zero values if not a primary transaction)

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp

types.name: RewardDistributionEvent
docs: Emitted when epoch-based lazy distribution occurs

fields.name: distribution_type
docs: Distribution type: "patron_pool", "ecosystem_pools"

fields.name: pool_id
docs: Pool identifier (creator pubkey for patron, empty for ecosystem)

fields.name: total_amount
docs: Total amount distributed from streaming treasury (lamports)

fields.name: creator_amount
docs: Amount to creator (for patron distributions only)

fields.name: platform_amount
docs: Amount to platform treasury

fields.name: ecosystem_amount
docs: Amount to ecosystem treasury

fields.name: holder_pool_amount
docs: Amount to holder pool

fields.name: creator_dist_pool_amount
docs: Amount to creator distribution pool (for ecosystem distributions only)

fields.name: epoch_timestamp
docs: Epoch timestamp

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp

types.name: RewardTransferEvent
docs: Emitted when rewards are transferred between accounts (e.g., on NFT transfer)

fields.name: pool_type
docs: Pool type affected: "content", "bundle"

fields.name: pool_id
docs: Pool identifier (content or bundle pubkey)

fields.name: sender
docs: Sender wallet

fields.name: receiver
docs: Receiver wallet

fields.name: nft_asset
docs: NFT asset transferred

fields.name: sender_claimed
docs: Amount sender claimed before transfer (lamports)

fields.name: sender_new_debt
docs: Sender's new debt after transfer

fields.name: receiver_new_debt
docs: Receiver's new debt after transfer

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp

types.name: SecondaryRoyaltySyncEvent
docs: Emitted when secondary sale royalties are synced into the reward pool
This happens automatically when anyone claims rewards

fields.name: content
docs: Content whose reward pool received secondary royalties

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of secondary royalties synced (lamports)

fields.name: new_reward_per_share
docs: New reward_per_share after sync

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of sync

types.name: SubscriptionCancelledEvent
docs: Emitted when a subscription is cancelled

fields.name: subscription_type
docs: Subscription type: "patron_membership", "patron_subscription", "ecosystem"

fields.name: subscriber
docs: Subscriber wallet

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator (for patron subscriptions)

fields.name: stream_id
docs: Streamflow stream ID

fields.name: cancelled_at
docs: Cancelled timestamp

types.name: SubscriptionCreatedEvent
docs: Emitted when a subscription is created (patron or ecosystem)

fields.name: subscription_type
docs: Subscription type: "patron_membership", "patron_subscription", "ecosystem"

fields.name: subscriber
docs: Subscriber wallet

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator (for patron subscriptions)

fields.name: price
docs: Monthly price (lamports)

fields.name: stream_id
docs: Streamflow stream ID

fields.name: started_at
docs: Started timestamp

types.name: UnifiedNftRewardState
docs: Single account per NFT tracking all reward debts
Replaces separate NftRewardState per pool, reducing rent costs
PDA seeds: ["unified_nft_reward", nft_asset]

fields.name: nft_asset
docs: The NFT asset this state belongs to

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator of the content/bundle (for patron pool lookup)

fields.name: rarity
docs: Rarity tier of this NFT

fields.name: weight
docs: Weight of this NFT based on rarity (1=Common, 5=Uncommon, 20=Rare, 60=Epic, 120=Legendary)

fields.name: is_bundle
docs: Whether this is a bundle NFT (false = content NFT)

fields.name: content_or_bundle
docs: Content or Bundle pubkey (for pool lookup)

fields.name: content_or_bundle_debt
docs: Debt for ContentRewardPool OR BundleRewardPool (IMMEDIATE distribution)

fields.name: patron_debt
docs: Debt for CreatorPatronPool (LAZY distribution, uses virtual RPS at mint)

fields.name: global_debt
docs: Debt for GlobalHolderPool (LAZY distribution, uses virtual RPS at mint)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when this state was created (at mint time)

types.name: UserProfile
docs: User profile storing username and settings
PDA seeds: ["user_profile", owner]

fields.name: owner
docs: The wallet that owns this profile

fields.name: username
docs: User's display name (max 20 chars)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when profile was created

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp when profile was last updated

types.name: VoteChoice
docs: Moderator vote choice

types.name: VoteRecord
docs: Individual vote record
PDA seeds: ["vote_record", report, moderator]

fields.name: report
docs: Report being voted on

fields.name: moderator
docs: Moderator who cast the vote

fields.name: choice
docs: Vote choice

fields.name: voted_at
docs: Timestamp when vote was cast

types.name: WalletContentState
docs: Wallet-content state tracking
Tracks a wallet's position in a specific content's reward pool
Aggregates all NFTs a wallet owns for a given content
PDA seeds: ["wallet_content", wallet, content_pda]

fields.name: wallet
docs: The wallet this state belongs to

fields.name: content
docs: The content this state tracks

fields.name: nft_count
docs: Number of NFTs this wallet owns for this content

fields.name: reward_debt
docs: Cumulative reward debt (sum of reward_per_share at each NFT acquisition)
Used to calculate pending: (nft_count * current_rps) - reward_debt

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when first NFT was acquired

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp of last update
